title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 940.4 - Table I

State Regulations
TABLE I
CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
WHICH ARE ASSIGNED TO ALL FRESH SURFACE WATERS WITHIN THE HOOSIC RIVER DRAINAGE
BASIN, RENSSELAER AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES, NEW YORK
Item

No. Waters Index

Number

Name

Description

Map

Ref. No. Class

Standards

H-264, portion as described

Hoosic River

Enters Hudson-Champlain Canal from northeast across
the Hudson River from Village of Stillwater, 1.5 miles upstream from Lock 3. From mouth to 0.1 mile below trib. 6a. J-25

Buskirk. J-26nw
